title.text: RFC 5498: IANA Allocations for Mobile Ad Hoc Network (MANET) Protocols

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                        I. Chakeres
Request for Comments: 5498                                        CenGen
Category: Standards Track                                     March 2009
IANA Allocations for Mobile Ad Hoc Network (MANET) Protocols
contents.zh-CHS: 移动自组网（MANET）协议的IANA分配

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document enumerates several common IANA allocations for use by Mobile Ad hoc NETwork (MANET) protocols. The following well-known numbers are required: a UDP port number, an IP protocol number, and a link-local multicast group address.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档列举了几种常见的IANA分配，供移动自组织网络（MANET）协议使用。需要以下已知号码：UDP端口号、IP协议号和链路本地多播组地址。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document enumerates several common IANA allocations for use by one or more protocols that conform to [RFC5444]. The following well-known numbers are required: a UDP port number, an IP protocol number, and a link-local multicast group address. All interoperable protocols running on these well-known IANA allocations MUST conform to [RFC5444]. [RFC5444] provides a common format that enables one or more protocols to share the IANA allocations defined in this document unambiguously.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档列举了几个常见的IANA分配，供符合[RFC5444]的一个或多个协议使用。需要以下已知号码：UDP端口号、IP协议号和链路本地多播组地址。在这些众所周知的IANA分配上运行的所有互操作协议必须符合[RFC5444]。[RFC5444]提供了一种通用格式，使一个或多个协议能够毫不含糊地共享本文档中定义的IANA分配。

contents.text: 2. Conventions Used in This Document
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 本文件中使用的公约

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照RFC 2119[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: 3. UDP Port Number
contents.zh-CHS: 3. UDP端口号

contents.text: MANET routers require a well-known UDP port number [IANA] to send and receive MANET routing protocol packets. The title of this UDP port is "manet". The value of this UDP port is 269.
contents.zh-CHS: MANET路由器需要一个众所周知的UDP端口号[IANA]来发送和接收MANET路由协议数据包。此UDP端口的标题为“manet”。此UDP端口的值为269。

contents.text: 4. IP Protocol Number
contents.zh-CHS: 4. IP协议号

contents.text: MANET routers require a well-known IP protocol number [IANA] to send and receive MANET routing protocol packets. The title of this IP protocol number is "manet". The value of this IP protocol number is 138.
contents.zh-CHS: MANET路由器需要一个众所周知的IP协议号[IANA]来发送和接收MANET路由协议数据包。该IP协议编号的标题为“manet”。此IP协议号的值为138。

contents.text: 5. Link-Local Multicast Group for MANET Routers
contents.zh-CHS: 5. MANET路由器的链路本地多播组

contents.text: MANET routers require a well-known, link-local multicast address [RFC4291] to send and receive MANET routing protocol packets. The name of the multicast address to reach link-local (LL) MANET routers is "LL-MANET-Routers".
contents.zh-CHS: MANET路由器需要一个众所周知的链路本地多播地址[RFC4291]来发送和接收MANET路由协议数据包。到达链路本地（LL）MANET路由器的多播地址的名称为“LL MANET路由器”。

contents.text: For IPv4, a well-known, link-local scope multicast address is required. The address for LL-MANET-Routers is 224.0.0.109.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于IPv4，需要一个众所周知的链路本地作用域多播地址。LL MANET路由器的地址为224.0.0.109。

contents.text: For IPv6, a well-known, link-local scope multicast address is required. The address for LL-MANET-Routers is FF02:0:0:0:0:0:0:6D.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于IPv6，需要一个众所周知的链路本地范围多播地址。LL MANET路由器的地址是FF02:0:0:0:0:0:0:0:6D。

contents.text: 6. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. IANA考虑

contents.text: This document enumerates several common IANA allocations for use by one or more protocols that conform to [RFC5444]. Specifically, the following well-known numbers have been assigned: a UDP port (Section 3), an IP protocol number (Section 4), and a link-local multicast group address (Section 5).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档列举了几个常见的IANA分配，供符合[RFC5444]的一个或多个协议使用。具体而言，已分配了以下众所周知的编号：UDP端口（第3节）、IP协议编号（第4节）和链路本地多播组地址（第5节）。

contents.text: Action 1:
contents.zh-CHS: 行动1：

contents.text: IANA has made the following assignments in the "PORT NUMBERS" registry:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA在“端口号”注册表中进行了以下分配：

contents.text: sub-registry "WELL KNOWN PORT NUMBERS"
contents.zh-CHS: 子注册表“已知端口号”

contents.text:
Keyword Decimal Description     References
------- ------- -----------     ----------
manet   269/udp MANET Protocols [RFC5498]
Action 2:
contents.zh-CHS: 行动2：

contents.text: IANA has made the following assignments in the "PROTOCOL NUMBERS" registry:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA在“协议编号”注册表中进行了以下分配：

contents.text: sub-registry "WELL KNOWN PORT NUMBERS"
contents.zh-CHS: 子注册表“已知端口号”

contents.text:
Keyword Decimal Description     References
------- ------- -----------     ----------
manet   138     MANET Protocols [RFC5498]
Action 3:
contents.zh-CHS: 行动3：

contents.text: IANA has made the following assignments in the "Internet Multicast Addresses" registry:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA在“Internet多播地址”注册表中进行了以下分配：

contents.text: sub-registry "224.0.0.0 - 224.0.0.255 (224.0.0/24) Local Network Control Block"
224.0.0.109 LL-MANET-Routers [RFC5498]
contents.zh-CHS: 224.0.0.109 LL移动自组网路由器[RFC5498]

contents.text: Action 4:
contents.zh-CHS: 行动4：

contents.text: IANA has made the following assignments in the "INTERNET PROTOCOL VERSION 6 MULTICAST ADDRESSES" registry:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA在“INTERNET协议版本6多播地址”注册表中进行了以下分配：

contents.text: sub-registry "Fixed Scope Multicast Addresses"
contents.zh-CHS: 子注册表“固定作用域多播地址”

contents.text: sub-sub-registry "Link-Local Scope"
contents.zh-CHS: 子注册表“链接本地范围”

contents.text: FF02:0:0:0:0:0:0:6D LL-MANET-Routers [RFC5498]
7. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document specifies only well-known numbers for protocols that conform to [RFC5444], and it not does not specify the protocols that carry the information across the network. Each protocol using these well-known numbers may have its own set of security issues, but those issues are not affected by using the IANA allocations specified herein.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件仅规定了符合[RFC5444]的协议的已知编号，未规定在网络上传输信息的协议。使用这些已知号码的每个协议可能有自己的一组安全问题，但这些问题不受使用本文指定的IANA分配的影响。

contents.text: The security issues associated with possibly operating multiple cooperating protocols using the same IANA assignments (e.g., UDP port) MUST be addressed in each protocol's specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须在每个协议的规范中解决与可能使用相同IANA分配（例如UDP端口）操作多个协作协议相关的安全问题。

contents.text: 8. Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 致谢

contents.text: Fred Templin, Bill Fenner, Alexandru Petrescu, Sam Weiler, Ross Callon, and Lars Eggert provided valuable input to this document.
contents.zh-CHS: Fred Templin、Bill Fenner、Alexandru Petrescu、Sam Weiler、Ross Callon和Lars Eggert为本文档提供了宝贵的输入。

contents.zh-CHS: 9. 工具书类
